abstract: Profile of Bill Shine, former right-hand man of deposed Fox News chairman Roger Ailes who now runs news and programming at Fox News and Fox Business Network; associates and colleagues say Shine's approachable management style is welcomed change; assignment implies media mogul Rupert Murdoch will not do full-scale removal of close Ailes associates.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Shine, a loyal right-hand man to Roger Ailes, was little known outside the TV industry before Mr. Ailes’s abrupt departure and his promotion.

headline.main: Bill Shine Steps Out From Behind the Scenes to Lead Fox News
headline.print_headline: A Behind-the-Scenes Executive Steps Forward to Take a Starring Role at Fox News
